txt.en: 'Merchants are nowhere to be found since things got bad in the Westfold, and we've not had any supplies coming in. I fear that soon our gates will close against the tide of enemies.\n\n'We do not have enough food to survive a long siege! Have you any skill at hunting? Any meat we can add to our stores would be a great comfort.'
The keeper of Grimslade's food-stores is concerned about the lack of usual supplies coming in during the wartime.
'Thank you, [placeholder]! This will do well for a while. Lady Hildith will surely be pleased that we have more food set aside for a siege.'
Game animals can be found in the green plains of the Westfold.\n\nYou should hunt game animals for food to bolster Grimslade's stores.
Éobert can be found in Grimslade near the food stores.\n\nYou should bring the meat to Éobert.
